text: [Ej pajomʙar] Bigu: «Man moliki sudu zijoni xestan nestam, magar onciro, ki Alloh taolo ʙixohad va agar ƣajʙro medonistam, xajr [-u sudi] ʙisjore [ʙaroi xud] faroham mesoxtam va hec ʙadi [va zijone] ʙa man namerasid. Man [kase] nestam, magar ʙimdihanda va ʙasoratʙaxs [-i dilsuz] ʙaroi guruhe, ki imon dorand
